about_the_game:
It's about time to get gang locked in. Prego Wars is an over-the-top first-person-shooter deathmatch experience developed by a bunch of idiot people, targeted at other idiot people. I know you're looking for that next game to convince everyone to buy. I see you.

Characters

Choose from eight entirely unique characters designed in our professional studio (discord call); each coming equipped with ridiculous abilities that somehow synergize together to make a wildly dynamic battlefield.

Strategically turn people to gold, blow up your gun, fire music notes, hide in tall grass, fire your own head as a cannonball, summon the troll god to reign havoc on the battlefield; you get the point...

  • Zipdip, sporting "brick" walls, an explosive head cannon, and an army of robots.

  • Plasma, who has mastered the art of not caring, fires random garbage from golden portals in the sky.

  • Salty, armed with nothing but ice cream, a comically large spoon, his fists, and a dream.

  • Luke, coffee-loving and adept at farming... both plant life, and his enemies.

  • Onyx, harnessing the power of ear-shattering dubstep and creative tools.

  • Yucky, bound by the love for his animals, gives him a double-edged sword in battle.

  • Checken, utilizing the power of Midas, his cat, and a gun that shoots back into himself.

  • Preston, equipped with pancakes, and uh, that's it. Some syrup too, I guess. Can't forget that.

Mutators

Spice up your matches with 32 unique mutators that can be manually/randomly chosen to change the way the game plays. And these aren't just regular old mutators... Add bounty hunting, flames covering the map, pirates, rocket boots, you name it. Have mutators randomize every round and unlock them with super unique achievements and challenges.

Map Editor

Prego Wars comes fully equipped with the same tools we used to make our official maps. Use the asset editor to create props and materials, then build your map and publish it to the Steam Workshop. You will literally never run out of places to play on, and if you do... make more!

legal_notice:
Achievement Icons were created by Reversicle (@reversicle on Discord)

The word "Prego" does not indicate association with any particular entity, it's short for "Pregnant." And, while none of the boys are actually pregnant, it is the preferred word used to describe them and their shenanigans.
name: Prego Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any dedicated
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tato

short_description: Prego Wars is a ridiculous fast-paced first-person shooter deathmatch featuring eight unique characters with creative abilities, [Insert Here] custom maps, 32 crazy unique match mutators, and a fully-featured map editor/tooling with workshop support.
